scripts.build: npm run build:front && npm run copy:front && npm run build:back
scripts.psql: docker exec -it postgres psql -U mockdb_user -d mockdb
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:rebuild && docker compose run --rm dbmate wait && npm run db:refresh
scripts.db:rebuild: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:refresh: docker exec -i postgres psql -U mockdb_user -d mockdb -c 'DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;' && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:seed: for f in $(ls db/seeds/*.sql | sort); do docker exec -i postgres psql -U mockdb_user -d mockdb -f $f; done
